title: Unable to connect to login queue and sign in online for support
body: I keep getting an error on login saying that it cannot connect to the queue. Then when I tried to get on the support page i couldn't send in a request because it wouldn't let me sign in. Anyone have solutions? Tried to call Riot to, but their only support is on the web page. Which honestly is ridiculous.

replies.body: It sounds like your network might be having a hard time getting connected to our servers. You should be able to get signed back in by adjusting a few of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but hit me back up if that's not helping!

Sorry, I had just gone on my weekend when you posted but I'm here now! {{summoner:31}} 

Since you still can't seem to get it and it's been awhile since you could, let's go ahead and get you more in-depth help from our tech guys. Shoot them a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help figure this out!

Nah you good I understand! So I can get on the homepage and community boards, but when I try to access the support page it doesn't say I am logged in. Then when I try to login it says signing you out then says there was an error.
Weeeiiiiiird, try opening that ticket in a private/incognito window if you can.
Yeah that didn't work either. Is there a way I could send you the logs and have you pass it on?

If it's still not working then I would suggest emailing us at Support@Riotgames.com That will get a ticket into us and someone will reply back to it! 

Curious though, what error are you getting when trying to submit a ticket?

So I am logged in now, which is obvious because I can reply, but when i try to access the support page I am no longer signed in. So then I try to re login. When I click login it goes into the login page, but starts to sign me out, which is weird because it said I was signed out. Then says an error occurred please contact something. That is why I can't submit a ticket. Lol I hope that made sense.
Just sent an email too! Thank you so much and sorry for all the posts and replies XD

I worked all weekend and just got back to my computer. I tried to reset some of my network settings, but nothing has come of it. Do you have any other suggestions? I would really love to play on my days off, so this sucks!
I could play before the patch, but after I couldn't.
Yep, same problem ... please let me know how to fix
Getting this error i cant even log on and my internet is fine
